name: Cosmic Adventure (alejandro_real)
description:
Created by Alejandro Real Lopez, Clara Sagrario De La Cruz Reyes and  team, Game 2D is an educational game about an alien who travels in his spaceship to different planets and on each planet, he passes through there are other aliens who ask him questions about the universe. However, this game is still in development and has some bugs as well.

This game is a university project.

We give credits to Kenney creature mixer, Kenney UI pack and sounds, Pixel planet generator by Deep-Fold , Space backgrounds by Lukas Mrazik, Spring Spring , Rocky Roads by Essssam and Mountain Dusk Parallax background.

This game is in Spanish

Made in Godot Engine
